update t_card set brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=CHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=CHAR}, curr_num = #{currNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=CHAR}, picture_cdn = #{pictureCdn,jdbcType=CHAR}, prerogative = #{prerogative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, initial_word = #{initialWord,jdbcType=CHAR}, initial_num = #{initialNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

from t_card where status = 1 limit 1
